page.title: 11HOUSING, CWMBRAN
page.content: {TYPES OF HOMES-}The 3rd &4th yr.pupils of Maendy Primary School were questioned about the types of homes in which they lived.30 lived in terraced houses,7 in semi-detached houses ,1 in a detached house and 1 in aflat. {ENERGY AND CONSERVATION-}Of 39 homes, 37 had central-heating.23 heated by gas,8 heated by electricity &8 heated by coal.Gas is more popular because it is easy to use and is cheaper than other fuels.To keep heating costs low, 9 homes had doubled -glazed windows,15 have cavity-wall insulation & 19 have loft insulation.These methods of saving heat are expensive ,the cheaper of which is most popular & a Govt. grant is available.These figures may be affected by the number of homes that are owned in our school as there is a large Corporation housing estate in our area.
